entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain changing to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
